meanings.definition: A person who seeks favor or advancement through flattery or servile behavior.
meanings.sent1: The office pickthanks always complimented the boss to get ahead.
meanings.sent2: The pickthanks in the group constantly praised others to gain favor.
meanings.sent3: The pickthanks tried to butter up everyone in the office, but it was obvious to all.
meanings.sent4: She was a pickthanks, always sweet-talking her way into special treatment.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the pickthanks who only says nice things for personal gain.

meanings.definition: To express gratitude or appreciation insincerely or for personal gain.
meanings.sent1: He would pickthanks his way into getting freebies at the store.
meanings.sent2: She would pickthanks her way through social events, pretending to be thankful.
meanings.sent3: The kids pickthanksed their way into getting extra dessert by pretending to be grateful.
meanings.sent4: The politician would pickthanks his supporters, but his insincerity was evident.
meanings.sent5: She would pickthanks her way through life, never truly appreciating anything.
